abilities.description: Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster. The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

additionalInformation: Abilities reflected receive its Aghanim's Scepter upgrades only if the reflecting hero has Aghanim's Scepter, regardless of whether the original caster has it or not. This applies to abilities upgraded by talents and Aghanim's Shard as well.
name: Lotus Orb
description: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.
trivia: The ability to reflect single-target abilities back to their casters is actually an old ability concept in Dota. It was first seen in version 6.00 as a chance-based passive ability, belonging to Linken's Mirror, the pre-rework version of Linken's Sphere. The ability was removed in 6.09 and replaced by Spell Block, as Linken's Sphere got reworked.
tips: Projectile-based abilities are nearly always reflected upon impact. This makes them easier to reflect than spells with instant effect because the Echo Shell can be placed on the targeted unit before the projectile hits.
